1031630.name: Vaporspace
1031630.description:
Explore the endless Vaporspace. A SHMUP inspired by idle games, RPGs and vaporwave. Defeat enemies and bosses in easy relaxing stages or challenge yourself to gain more upgrades, levels, power-ups and artifacts to strive for the highest stages!

Randomly generated stages and fast paced gameplay keep the game diverse with several variations of enemies, attacks, and even more for scenery.
Visit rainy skyscrapers, twilight ruins, future utopias, pixel worlds, virtual skies, luxurious libraries, nostalgic simulations, fragmented vistas, abandoned subways, dream galaxies, moonlit glaciers, digital dojos and many more.

- Amazing soundtrack by Doomroar and Stevia Sphere.
- 29 Ships each with an auto-fire primary attack, and 2 special abilities.
- Summon 3 helper ships to increase your firepower or just to play with friends.
- Set helpers to follow, stay in a certain part of the screen, or even collect items for you.
- Millions of potential level/scenery combos, variations, and permutations.
- Backup save system and Steam Cloud saving. Save to %appdata%\Roaming\vaporsave
- 97 In-game/Steam Achievements
- Ongoing: Help decide what will be added to the game! I want to add more ships, enemies, attack patterns, areas and more.

Completed Future content packs :
1.1 Cities: (5) Ships (13 Areas) Seattle, Los Angeles, Hong Kong, Seoul, Vancouver, Kowloon

Future content packs (free updates) -

1.2 Seapunk: Archipelago, Atoll, Hawaii, Underwater, Island, Cove
Spooky: Hell, Cave, Dungeon, Catacombs, Hollow
Fantasy: Ramparts, Village, Fortress, Cathedral, Porcelain
Deep Space: Asteroid Belt, Quasar, Black Hole, Tempest, Cosmic
48 Ships Total

Possible but not guaranteed or finalized:
Mallsoft, Outrun, Wastelands, Virtual, Abstract, Xenoworlds.
72 Ships Total
